title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, July 26, 2021
description: "The worst sin towards our fellow creatures is not to hate them, but to be indifferent to them: That's the essence of inhumanity." –George Bernard Shaw, born 1856
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
